author: mirichmo

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@mirichmo**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution!

It looks like you're a Microsoft contributor (Mike Richmond). If you're full-time, we DON'T require a Contribution License Agreement. If you are a vendor, please DO sign the electronic Contribution License Agreement. It will take 2 minutes and there's no faxing! https://cla.microsoft.com.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: Travis is failing because the v6.0.0-alpha.12 package has not been published on GitHub.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
Hi @andschwa, I just noticed this morning that the `docker` branch in `PowerShell/PowerShell` is gone. Isn't the automated docker build at https://hub.docker.com/r/microsoft/powershell/ depending on it?
Was that branch removed on purpose?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @daxian-dbw I have no clue why it was removed. But it's no matter, just make another and push it.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @andschwa OK, will do. And that will trigger the automated docker build of `microsoft/powershell` right?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Correct, but the packages need to be posted first. Love chicken-egg problems :)

title: Change log and 6.0.0-alpha.12 version number updates
